ValidationRule.description: Architect is needed, before moving the Oppty to any further stages
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISBLANK (Architect_Account__c), CloseDate >= Date(2023,06,01), IsWon = TRUE, OR( (ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closed Won")), (ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Finalizing")), (ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Assessment of Needs")), (ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Technical support")), (ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Quoted")), (ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Positive Follow-up")), (ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Negotiation")) ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please, add an Architect in order to move the Opportunity further
